title: I create websites that help attract clients and grow online
description: From idea to launch and support — I take care of the entire process:

steps.title: Business immersion and strategy
steps.text: Market research, competitor analysis, goal setting.

steps.title: Design and prototype
steps.text: UI/UX design tailored to your needs, responsive for all devices.

steps.title: Development and integrations
steps.text: Technical implementation, CRM and payment system integration.

steps.title: Optimization and launch
steps.text: Speed, SEO, testing — and going online.
